sentences.english: Even criminal cases are not immune.
sentences.chinese: 甚至犯罪案件也不能幸免。

sentences.english: Judicial accounting technology is a specialism means to investigate and prosecute economic crime case.
sentences.chinese: 司法会计技术是查办经济犯罪案件的专门手段。

sentences.english: That crime had nothing to do with money.
sentences.chinese: 那起犯罪案与金钱无关。

sentences.english: Of course Do-jun could be guilty and Jin-tae had no involvement.
sentences.chinese: 当然东俊也许确实有罪而金泰与罪案毫无关联。

sentences.english: Observing an anti-crime operation in Yau Tsim Police District.
sentences.chinese: 观察油尖警区的反罪案行动。

sentences.english: The crime seemed to have been committed without motive.
sentences.chinese: 这一罪案似乎并无作案动机。

sentences.english: You are now a witness in his criminal investigation.
sentences.chinese: 你现在成为他罪案调查的目击证人了。

sentences.english: There are only two crimes this year so far in my neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，今年我们居民区才发生了两起犯罪案。

sentences.english: Procuratorates also supervised the public security organs in investigation of 5 IPR infringement crimes.
sentences.chinese: 监督公安机关立案侦查侵犯知识产权犯罪案件5件。

sentences.english: Palmer heads toward the crime scene, and Novick forcibly stops him.
sentences.chinese: 帕默向罪案现场走去，诺维克强行地拦住了他。

sentences.english: The police are investigating a crime.
He is the accessory of this crime, so he is also sentences to one year.
sentences.chinese: 他是这起犯罪案的同谋，所以被判有期徒刑一年。

sentences.english: The attorney general will prosecute in trial for serious crime.
sentences.chinese: 首席检查官将在严重犯罪案的审判中作公诉人。

sentences.english: She was concerned in the crime.
Source of tax cases forms the foundation of public security organs' tax investigation work.
sentences.chinese: 涉税犯罪案件来源是公安税侦工作的前提和基础。

sentences.english: He did't tell us about that crime shrouded in mystery all along.
sentences.chinese: 他始终也没把那件离奇的犯罪案告诉我们。

definition: to commit a crime or offence
